body:
Please note the warning on that the [NaCl page](https://nacl.cr.yp.to/sign.html) for the signature system:

> WARNING: This signature software (both at the C level and at the C++ level) is a prototype. It will be replaced by the final system Ed25519 in future NaCl releases. A NaCl-compatible Ed25519 implementation is already available as part of SUPERCOP.

I have an Ed25519 implementation in my personal repo and #8581 is probably going to cause it to be imported into x/crypto soon. However, it won't live in x/crypto/nacl until NaCl itself is updated to contain the final version.
